div.p: title: Base FHIR compartment definition for Device(example)
publisher: Health Level Seven International (FHIR Infrastructure)
description: The set of resources associated with a particular Device (example with Communication and CommunicationRequest resourses only).
purpose: Provides an example of a FHIR compartment definition based on the Device resource type.
jurisdiction: United States of America (the) (Details : {urn:iso:std:iso:3166 code 'US' = 'US', given as 'United States of America (the)'})

blockquote.p: documentation: The device used as the message sender and recipient
